<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="Import Historic NeedIt Data">43e51b761b73301046bac991604bcb39</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function runTransformScript(source, map, log, target /*undefined onStart*/ ) {

// If the coalesce field(s) determine there is no match between the  
  // source data row and the target table, do not create a record in 
  // the target table. 

  if (action == 'insert') {
    ignore = true;
  }


})(source, map, log, target);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-11-17 14:19:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>e939933a1b73301046bac991604bcba0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onBefore</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_e939933a1b73301046bac991604bcba0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-11-17 14:19:57</sys_updated_on><when>onBefore</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
